structMember.name: mcc
structMember.description: The MCC part of a PLMN identity used in the radio network.

structMember.name: mnc
structMember.description: The MNC part of a PLMN identity used in the radio network.

structMember.name: mncLength
structMember.description: The length of the MNC part of a PLMN identity used in the radio network.

structMember.name: sequenceStructMember1
structMember.description: Struct member is ordered, unique sequence

structMember.name: sequenceStructMember2
structMember.description: Struct member is non-ordered, non-unique sequence

structMember.name: mcc
structMember.description: Mobile Country Code (a part of the PLMN identity) for a cell that is served by a neighbor eNB.

structMember.name: mnc
structMember.description: Mobile Network Code (a part of the PLMN identity) for a cell that is served by a neighbor eNB.

structMember.name: mncLength
structMember.description:
This parameter defines the number of digits for the Mobile Network Code (a part of the PLMN identity) for a cell that is served by a neighbor eNB.
The PLMN identity combines the following two parts: 1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits
Example: If MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.

exception.name: DynamicCellStatusException
exception.description: Will be thrown if Dynamic Cell Status cannot be returned.

attribute.name: timeAndPhaseSynchCritical
attribute.description: Indicates if the cell can operate as an asynchronous cell under error conditions.

attribute.name: RootId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: sctpRef
attribute.description: Refers to the SCTP instance that is used to configure the SCTP host for S1 and X2 connections.

attribute.name: dnsLookupOnTai
attribute.description:
Controls if the Tracking Area Identity (TAI) is used to get IP addresses of MME nodes from the Domain Name System (DNS).
The RBS uses TAI to automatically obtain all MME IP addresses from the DNS when dnsLookupOnTai is switched on, or at RBS start or restart.
The MME IP address list is refreshed periodically and MME connections released and setup according to the new list. The MME IP address list can also be refreshed from OSS-RC.

attribute.name: dnsLookupTimer
attribute.description: The interval to perform DNS Lookup to get potential new IP addresses of MME nodes. DNS lookup is performed for the TAI domain name. If the value is set to zero, then no periodic DNS Lookup is done.

attribute.name: dscpLabel
attribute.description: Static mapping of DiffServ label for control messages, Performance Management (PM), and Non-Access Stratum (NAS).
attribute.dependencies: Will only be used then dscpUsage is active.

attribute.name: eNBId
attribute.description: The ENodeB ID that forms part of the Cell Global Identity, and is also used to identify the node over the S1 interface.

attribute.name: eNodeBPlmnId
attribute.description: The ENodeB Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) ID that forms part of the ENodeB Global ID used to identify the node over the S1 interface.

attribute.name: oaMLinkSuperVisionActive
attribute.description: Controls enabling and disabling the supervision function that restarts the RBS when the O&M link is disabled.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::oaMLinkSuperVisionActive.

attribute.name: x2BlackList
attribute.description: A list of blacklisted RBS IDs. X2 may not be set up to any neighbor RBS in the blacklist. Attribute is ordered, unique sequence
attribute.disturbances: If an eNB is added to the list, any termPointToEnb for this external eNB is removed.

attribute.name: sequenceAttributeX
attribute.description: This is a sequence attribute.

attribute.name: sequenceAttributeY
attribute.description: This is a sequence attribute.

attribute.name: sequenceAttributeZ
attribute.description: This is a sequence attribute.

attribute.name: x2retryTimerMaxAuto
attribute.description: See attribute x2RetryTimerStart.

attribute.name: x2retryTimerStart
attribute.description:
After failed X2 setup and after X2 link break the x2RetryTimer is used to control the time till next retry. x2RetryTimer is used for DNS, SCTP, X2AP retries and x2IpAddrViaS1.
After first failed setup or missing IP address from DNS, x2RetryTimer = max(x2RetryTimerStart,W), where W is the timeToWait received in x2SetupFail. If W is not received, W=0.
After link break, x2RetryTimer = random(0,x2RetryTimerStart). If the first setup after link break fails, the timer values according to the above and below paragraphs shall apply as for failed inital setup.
After 2nd and following fails, if the X2 connection is not being setup by ANR in the S-RBS, x2RetryTimer = max(x2RetryTimerStart,W).
After 2nd and following fails, if the X2 connection is being setup by ANR in the S-RBS, x2RetryTimer = max(min[2^(n-2)*x2RetryTimerStart, x2retryTimerMaxAuto], W), where n is failure number.
Each W is only used in the first retry after it is received.

attribute.name: x2WhiteList
attribute.description: The list of whitelisted RBS IDs. Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) is not allowed to disconnect X2 for any neighbor RBS in the whitelist.

attribute.name: pmHwUtilDl
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The PDF shall be updated each TTI with the percentage of hardware resources used.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHwUtilUl
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The PDF shall be updated each TTI with the percentage of PDCCH resources used.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: s1RetryTimer
attribute.description: Defines the frequency to perform re-establishment of SCTP and S1-AP connection, when the connection to a MME is lost.

attribute.name: tHODataFwdReordering
attribute.description: Target eNodeB supervision of the DL data forwarding activity. The timer is started when DL data on S1-U is received. At expiry the tunnel end-point for DL forwarding is locally released.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Has no functional behaviour, planned to be removed.

attribute.name: ulSchedulerDynamicBWAllocationEnabled
attribute.description: Specifies if the advanced UL scheduler is enabled

attribute.name: upIpAccessHostRef
attribute.description: Refers to the IpAccessHostEt instance to use for configuring the IP access host for S1 and X2 user plane connections. This attribute must contain a valid MO reference if the IPsec function is used.
attribute.deprecated: Since L14A. Replaced by upIpAddressRef

attribute.name: x2IpAddrViaS1Active
attribute.description: Indicates if the function X2 IP addresses over S1 is active in the RBS.

attribute.name: dlTransNwBandwidth
attribute.description: Downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by AdmissionControl::dlTransNwBandwidth. Since L11B.

attribute.name: ulTransNwBandwidth
attribute.description: Uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by AdmissionControl::ulTransNwBandwidth. Since L11B.

attribute.name: dlAccGbrAdmThresh
attribute.description: Admission threshold on accumulated Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) in the downlink, expressed as a fraction of the downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Replaced by AdmissionControl::dlGbrAdmThresh.
attribute.dependencies: The downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute ENodeBFunction::dlTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: ulAccGbrAdmThresh
attribute.description: Admission threshold on accumulated Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) in the uplink, expressed as a fraction of the uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by AdmissionControl::ulGbrAdmThresh. Since L11B.
attribute.dependencies: The uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute ENodeBFunction::ulTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: ipAddress
attribute.description: The IP address of the host. This is a mirrored value of the attribute ipAddress, MO IpAccessHostEt or AddressIPv4/AddressIPv6.

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlEth
attribute.description: Total number of downlink DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded in the Ethernet part of the eNB.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer.

attribute.name: SchedulingStrategy
attribute.description: The scheduling strategy that is used in the RBS.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: rrcConnReestActive
attribute.description: Indicates if the feature RRC Connection Reestablishment is ACTIVATED or DEACTIVATED.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: pmZtemporary34
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary35
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: x2SetupTwoWayRelations
attribute.description: This parameter indicates if two way relations shall be setup during X2 setup and eNB configuration. The RBS creates a two-way relation for each entry in the received neighbour information that contains a relation to a source cell. Neighbour information is sent in X2 setup and eNB configuration. Neighbour information is eUtranCellRelations per source cell from the sending node.

attribute.name: technicianPresent
attribute.description: Indicates that a technician on site has pushed the Maintenance Button. Persistently stored attribute not handled by CV.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::technicianPresent.

attribute.name: alarmSuppressed
attribute.description: Indicates that all alarms in the node are suppressed. Alarm suppression can be started on site via a push on the Maintenance Button or off site via OSS-RC. Persistently stored attribute not handled by CV.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::alarmSuppressed.
attribute.dependencies: Remote management applications can only change this attribute if attribute ENodeBFunction::technicianPresent=false.

attribute.name: timePhaseMaxDeviation
attribute.description: Defines the maximum allowed time/phase deviation for time/phase synchronization of the eNodeB.
attribute.dependencies: This parameter is relevant when the parameter timeAndPhaseSynchCritical has the value true.

attribute.name: pmRohcCidDlSum
attribute.description: Sum of all downlink sample values recorded for the number of Robust Header Compression context IDs
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: At each time sampled measurement, the result is added to the existing aggregated value.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidDlSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding downlink Sum counters has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRohcCidDlSum.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidUlSum
attribute.description: Sum of all uplink sample values recorded for the number of Robust Header Compression context IDs
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: At each time sampled measurement, the result is added to the existing aggregated value.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidUlSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding uplink Sum counters has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRohcCidUlSum.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPagS1Received
attribute.description: This counter counts the number of received S1AP Paging messages in the RBS.
attribute.condition: When a S1AP Paging is received from an MME which is correct and complete. S1AP Paging messages containing ASN.1 errors are not counted.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPagS1Discarded
attribute.description: The number of S1AP Paging messages that are discarded (and not routed to any cell) due to that the maximum number of incoming S1AP Paging messages during a certain time interval is reached. This counter is a subset of pmPagS1Received.
attribute.condition: An S1AP Paging message is discarded due to max intensity of incoming S1AP Paging messages is reached.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: s1HODirDataPathAvail
attribute.description: S1 Handover data forwarding can be of two types, direct and indirect. Direct forwarding requires direct connectivity between source and target eNodeB. This parameter is used to indicate if such direct connectivity exist.
attribute.dependencies: Optional Feature Data Forwarding at S1 Handover

attribute.name: randCdma20001xRtt
attribute.description: Rand initial value used for authentication input to the RAND generation algorithm in eNodeB The RAND-CDMA2000 concerns a random value, generated by the eNodeB, to be passed to the UE and MME.

attribute.name: minRandc
attribute.description: Rand range datatype is the eight most significant bits (MSB) of the Rand used for authentication. This attribute controls the minimum random number value that can be generated. Typically a range of random numbers is allocated to each system using this attribute.

attribute.name: maxRandc
attribute.description: Rand range datatype is the eight most significant bits (MSB) of the Rand used for authentication. This attribute controls the maximum random number value that can be generated. Typically a range of random numbers is allocated to each system using this attribute.

attribute.name: randUpdateInterval
attribute.description: Random number update interval This attribute specifies the time interval in minutes between random number generation. When this interval expires, the eNodeB generates a new random number between MinRandc and MaxRandc.

attribute.name: mfbiSupport
attribute.description: Specifies whether the feature Multiple Frequency Band Indicators is supported in the eNB.

attribute.name: pmMoFootprintMax
attribute.description: This counter specifies the current footprint in the eNB from the configured MO instances for all different Cell Relations and External Cells in relation to the MO system limit. The higher the value, the more internal memory is consumed in the eNB for MO instances for the different types of Cell Relations and External Cells. The value is the highest sampled value during a ROP period. When the value reaches 100, further creation attempts for MO instances are rejected.
attribute.condition: This counter is set to the latest available MO footprint calculation at the ROP period end.

attribute.name: upIpAddressRef
attribute.description: Refers to the IpAccessHostEt or AddressIPv4/AddressIPv6 instance to use for configuring the IP address for S1 and X2 user plane connections.
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute can affect traffic. A node restart is required.

attribute.name: mmeCodeListLTERelated
attribute.description: MME code for LTE.

action.name: updateMMEConnection
action.description:
This action shall make it possible to order the RBS to make a new DNS lookup to get possible new MME Pool addresses. The orderCode has two different options:
- Retain: This option will retain all connections that were included in DNS response and the connections that weren’t included in the response will be removed. For the IP addresses that were unknown for the RBS, the RBS will establish connections to those MMEs.
- Renew All existing: The RBS performs a DNS lookup. Release all S1 connections to the MMEs and connect to the MMEs that are included in the DNS response.
This action should be used only when dnsLookupOnTai has the value ON. The action is rejected if dnsLookupState has the value OFF.

action.name: collectTraces
action.description: Starts traces collection. Log files from the RBS node are collected and stored into a gzipped file, /c/logfiles/CollectTraces.log.zip. The same file is used every time, that is if a result file exists it is overwritten. If the action is started when a trace collection is already ongoing a ActionAlreadyInProgressException is thrown. Attribute collectTraceStatus shows the status of this operation.
action.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by action collectTraces on NodeManagementFunction.

action.name: createIratCellAndRel
action.description: This MO action is used for creation of ExternalUtranCellFDD/ExternalUtranCellTDD/UtranCellRelation or ExternalGeranCell/GeranCellRelation. The returnType is struct with the name; performedOperation.

parameter.name: arfcn
parameter.description: Arfcn is arfcnValueUtranDl for Utran. Arfcn is arfcnValueGeranDl for Geran.

parameter.name: pci
parameter.description: Indicates the physical layer identity of the cell. That is, the primary scrambling code for Utran. For Geran, pci is bcc and ncc.

parameter.name: sourcePlmnId
parameter.description: The plmnId of the source cell.

parameter.name: sourceEnbId
parameter.description: The eNBId of the source cell.

parameter.name: sourceCellid
parameter.description: The cellId of the source cell.

parameter.name: targetPlmnId
parameter.description: The plmnId of the target cell.

parameter.name: targetRncId
parameter.description: The eNBId of the target cell.

parameter.name: targetCellid
parameter.description: The cellId of the target cell.

parameter.name: rat
parameter.description: ExternalUtranCellFdds and UtranCellRelation are requested to be created if RAT is equal to UTRAN. ExternalGeranCellFdds and GeranCellRelation are requested to be created if RAT is equal to GERAN.

parameter.name: locationAreaCode
parameter.description: The Location Area Code of the external UTRAN cell and external Geran cell.

parameter.name: routingAreaCode
parameter.description: The Routing Area Code of the external UTRAN cell and external Geran cell.

action.name: collectAutIntLogs
action.description: Starts collection log files that are relevant to autointegration. The action runs COLI commands to produce a set of log files in the RBS node. The log files are collected and stored into the directory /c/logfiles/autointegration. For each log file, the same filename is used every time which means that old files are overwritten. If the action is started when a trace collection is already ongoing a ActionAlreadyInProgressException is thrown. Note that other logs and traces that are already filebased are not covered by this action. Attribute collectLogsStatus shows the status of this operation.
action.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by action collectAutIntLogs on NodeManagementFunction.

action.name: collectDynamicCellStatus
action.description: Returns a snapshot of the traffic status of the node divided per cell, in the form; number of attached UEs and set up radio bearers.

action.name: clearTechnicianPresent
action.description: Resets the attribute technicianPresent to false.
action.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by action clearTechnicianPresent on NodeManagementFunction.

class.name: AnrFunction
class.description: Contains parameters and constraints for Automatic Neighbor Relations (ANR) functions, such as adding or removing neighbor cells.

attribute.name: AnrFunctionId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: cellAddRankLimitEutran
attribute.description: Threshold value for reported rank for a cell to be automatically added as neighbor.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: cellAddRsrpOffsetEutran
attribute.description: Threshold offset value for reported power for a cell to be automatically added as neighbor.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.

attribute.name: cellAddRsrpThresholdEutran
attribute.description: Threshold value for reported power for a cell to be automatically added as neighbor.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Replaced by AnrFunctionEUtran::cellAddRsrpThresholdEutran.

attribute.name: cellAddRsrqOffsetEutran
attribute.description: Threshold offset value for reported quality for a cell to be automatically added as neighbor.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.

class.name: ManagedObject
class.description: The ManagedObject MO represents a generic MO type. It does not represent any real resource in the system and can therefore not be instanciated. It is used as a MO-reference that can refer to multiple MO types.
